name: Relics (WeaselDev, Dani, pidgeonroyal)
description:
Game for the Brackeys2022.2 game jam.

Watch over a museum during the night... Noise start to appear all around you. Objects fall to the floor. Are you really alone?

We didn't really had time to finish so a version that's more complete and less broken will be submitted as soon as the game jam is over.
